Summary: UFO seen over Salta city on may 22, 2011, triangle with lights
divs: Sighting DetailsAbout 3,15 pm local time, i was outside with a couple of friends, i saw an unidentified objet at north, it was a triangular objects with light above i stood still for about 7 minutes and the just disappeared. I first thought it was an airplane but i stood still and i noticed it was no airplane
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Salta
There were no other sightings in Salta on or around May 22nd 2011
